channel.title: Home on Raspberry pi hosted personal site
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Raspberry pi hosted personal site

item.description: I recently dug out my old dusty raspberry pi 4 from my old boxset. I was craving for a project, and since I got a decent laptop, I lost all use cases for the emulatorbox that the Raspi was originally inteded to be. I then decided to turn the raspi into a Pi-Hole, to block out nasty advertisements from my home network, regardless of the device in use. After that, the project spiraled further, I added Unbound for DNS handling.

item.title: About Me
item.description:

See more on the Projects page.
